actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to phase in the fee schedule for ambulance services to provide for equitable treatment of suppliers of such services that are required to equip all ambulances to provide advanced life support services.
short_title: Assurance of Advanced Life Support Act of 2001
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Assurance of Advanced Life Support Act of 2001 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to revise the fee schedule for ambulance services to phase-out the current basis of reimbursement in the same manner as the new portions of the fee schedule are phased-in with respect to the levels of ambulance service required to equip all ambulances to provide advanced life support services.

titles.title: Assurance of Advanced Life Support Act of 2001

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to phase in the fee schedule for ambulance services to provide for equitable treatment of suppliers of such services that are required to equip all ambulances to provide advanced life support services.
